pages.text: Using the twisting, thorn-covered tendrils of a rose bush, this spell allows you to create a trap on the ground at the location you're looking at.$(br2)This trap will then trigger the next time an entity steps near it, causing damage and knocking them back.$(br2)With modifiers, you can adjust the size and effects that it inflicts.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:rose_thorns/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Duration:$() The trap, once placed and armed, will last for $(spell:rose_thorns/SECONDS/trap_duration).$(br2)$(bold)Damage:$() The trap deals $(spell:rose_thorns/HEART/damage) hearts of damage.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() With the $(modifier:larger_trap)$() modifier enabled, the radius of the trap is increased, meaning entities don't have to get as close in order to trigger it.

$(bold)Knock-back:$() With the $(modifier:repelling_trap)$() modifier enabled, entities affected by the trap are knocked by with a strength of $(spell:rose_thorns/knockback).$(br2)$(bold)Peaceful:$() With the $(modifier:peaceful_trap)$() modifier enabled, only hostile entities are affected by traps.$(br2)$(bold)Weakness:$() With the $(modifier:weakening_trap)$() modifier enabled, entities that are damaged are also given Weakness $(spell:rose_thorns/ROMAN/weakness_amplifier) for $(spell:rose_thorns/SECONDS/weakness_duration).$(br2)$(bold)Undead:$() With the $(modifier:ghostly_trap)$()

modifier enabled, undead are dealt an additional $(spell:rose_thorns/HEART/undead_damage) hearts of damage.$(br2)$(bold)Poison:$() With the $(modifier:poisonous_trap)$() modifier enabled, entities affected by the trap are given Poison $(spell:rose_thorns/ROMAN/poison_amplifier) for $(spell:rose_thorns/SECONDS/poison_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Knock-up:$() With the $(modifier:boosting_trap)$() modifier enabled, entities are knocked directly up with a strength of $(spell:rose_thorns/knock_up).$(br2)$(bold)Fire:$() With the $(modifier:fire_trap)$() modifier enabled, damaged entities are set ablaze for

$(spell:rose_thorns/fire_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Strength:$() With the $(modifier:empowering_trap)$() modifier enabled, the caster is given Strength $(spell:rose_thorns/ROMAN/strength_amplifier) for $(spell:rose_thorns/SECONDS/strength_duration) seconds when the trap is triggered.$(br2)$(bold)Slowness:$() With the $(modifier:slowing_trap)$() modifier enabled, damaged entities are given Slowness $(spell:rose_thorns/ROMAN/slowness_amplifier) for $(spell:rose_thorns/SECONDS/slowness_duration) seconds.
